Ingredients.2: 2 large red potatoes, cut into 1-inch pieces

Ingredients.3: 5  baby carrots, cut into 1/2-inch slices, or more to taste

Ingredients.4: 2 teaspoons dried onion flakes, or to taste

Ingredients.7: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup

Ingredients.10: 1 tablespoon bacon bits, or more to taste

Ingredients.11: 0.25 cup chopped fresh parsley, or more to taste

Directions.1: Stir cauliflower, potatoes, carrots, and onion flakes together in a pot; add enough water to cover and stir in chicken bouillon cube. Bring to a simmer and cook until cauliflower is tender, about 10 minutes.

Directions.2: Transfer vegetable mixture and about 1 cup cooking liquid to a slow cooker. Stir cream of chicken soup, milk, cream cheese, and bacon bits into vegetable mixture.

Directions.3: Cook on Low, stirring occasionally, for 2 1/2 hours.

Directions.4: Stir parsley into soup and continue cooking until vegetable are tender and flavors blend, 1/2 to 1 1/2 hours. Top with shredded Cheddar cheese.
